ygData.subject: Been a long time...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it s been a few and I thought I would post a quick line or two. Wanna guess what I have to say? Yup you guessed it. I was approved for a loan for school
ygData.messageBody:
Well it's been a few and I thought I would post a quick line or two.
Wanna guess what I have to say? Yup you guessed it. I was approved
for a loan for school so now I can afford to either upgrade or buy a
whole new computer! Upgradeing would be cheaper, but buying a whole
new system would be easier. Plus I'll be able to get all the new toys
like a DVD player and larger hard drive. What do ya'll think? The
Raven P.S. Oh yeah I have to wait till either the end of this
month or the middle of next month. *sigh* giving with one hand.....
